Posts.Content: I need to decide whether to take femera now that i am done my round of Tamaxfen.  What side effects did you  experience?  I already have joint issues and some bone loss.  Did anyone gain weight?  Lose hair?  My  oncologist is leaving it up to me
Posts.Title: femera

Posts.Content:
I had breast cancer 2 years ago.  had a lumpectomy and had 5 nodes removed.  Underwent radiation and last mammo was fine.  I did have some nerve damage at the incision 
location but it did get better.  I just noticed that the area under my arm, where the incision is  very swollen and hurts.  I don't feel a lumo but the pain goes into my armpit as well.  Can you develope lympohdema this late?  Or.. what else could it be.   Prof
Posts.Title: lymphodema

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply.  I see my oncologist tomorrow.  Is there anything you can for this?
Posts.Title: lymphodema
breast pain

Posts.Content:
Hey.. we shoudl really swap email addresses. Don't know anyone else with BOTH CD and BC!
I am suppose to go for my FIRST follow up MRI's and mammograms in OCt. Not looking forward to it. Prior to stsrting radiation, I had another mammogram and they found 2 more spots they now want to 'watch". Hate that word. Also have to have an MRI of the right breast. Prior to surgery, had found a spot on the right breast and had a biospy. And.. they also found a spot on my femur they are watching. So... NOT looking forward to October. I am a BAD patient and have to admit, have already pushed the dates back.
How long have you had CD?? I have been sick for 13 years. On entocort EVERYDAY and 6mp. Alsong with a host of other meds! oudl love to chat.. don't know how
Prof
Posts.Title: New here & scared

Posts.Content:
Did anyone gain weight from this???  How long til u noticed the weight gain. i started it about
 7 weeks ago and have felt so bloated and when Iw was weighed at the doctors had gained a few pounds.  ( in less than 2 weeks)
Posts.Title: tamaxifen

Posts.Content: hi;
Posts.Title: new... feeling guilty still upset over dx

Posts.Content:
Again.. thanks! You are right, I have tried to shield family and friends from how I really feel. I have made light of the cancer and keep saying that because the other tests were Ok. that the rest is a "piece of cake." Problem is... this weekend i snapped at everyone and I figured out it was becasue I was so ANGRY at having cancer and feeling like it was no biggie. SO.... now I will forge on but allow myslef to grieve.
Just got my date for surgery. The adventrue begins!
prof
Posts.Title: new... feeling guilty still upset over dx
New here & scared

Posts.Content: I don't  know where to begin except to say.. I really want to bulls eye off my back!  I was just DX. with tubular breast cancer.  I know it is a "good kind: altho right now I don;t find comfort in that. Had an MRI today and they found ANOTHER spot so now have ANOTHER biospy scheduled.  I also had to have genetic testing.  My mother has had bi lateral breast cancer as well as pancreatic  cancer and is an ashkenasie jew.  So.... if the testing comes back positive... double mastectomy and ovararies out!  Too much for me to cope with.  So...
Posts.Title: brand new here... dx. with breast cancer but also have crohns disease

Posts.Content: I am just 6 months  post my radiation. I had a lumpectomy then radiation.  Before my treatment I had a mammogram and theyfound 2 more spots and are "watching" them.
Posts.Title: breast pain
triple negative/negative nodes

Posts.Content: My lumpectomy was almost 2 weeks ago.  Beside the tumor, I had 5 nodes removed from under my arm.  How long will it take before i can begin  physical activity like going back to the gym or  swinging a golf club?  When I raise my arm it still pulls and can hurt.  Do i need to wait til the pain is ALL away????
Posts.Title: physical activity after a lumpectomy

Posts.Content:
I am about
 to start radiation.  My oncologist wanted me to start tamoxafen ASAP... but I have waited til this week.  I saw the radiation oncologist and he said to start AFTER i have radiation... so... now what do I do???? Who do I listen to????
Posts.Title: when to start tomaxafen

Posts.Content:
THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!! I had begun to just think I was making more of this that it is. people are SO GLAD that my markers are negative which means NO double mastectomy ( I am very glad too!) but they are still forgetting that I have cancer. ALL good news.. that is what I have heard the last 2 days.. let's celebrate! I still want to cry but feel like an idiot since "all good news!"
Still waiting for the second set of markers to come back and YEs..I know there is a gene I have somewhere but hasn;t been found. I also have crohns disease ( lucky me) and when i was tested for those markers... inclonclusive! MY luck.
But. thanks for letting me sound off.. feel weird pretending nothing is wrong since the world around me has been obsessed with the good part of this.
prof
Posts.Title: new... feeling guilty still upset over dx

Posts.Content:
I think I kept thinking that becauase this was an outpatient procedure ti was going to be easy. They did have to take 5 nodes from under my arm and that is still killing me! 
How long til my arm is ok?
Prof
Posts.Title: tired after lumpectomy...how long

Posts.Content: I just had a lumpectomy this past Wed.  i also had to have 5 nodes removed which were under my arm. good news.. all negative!!!  I seem to be tired alot and want to know how long the fatgue may last.  I also have crohns disease which I am sure is NOT helping.  My arm hurts when I move it to the right and left since the one incision is under my arm. I have another one on the side of the breast.
Posts.Title: tired after lumpectomy...how long

Posts.Content:
Sasha... i won't give up hope. But..I also have crohns. So dealing with ALL the effects of the crohns AND breast cancer really just was a bit too much! i spend do much time being sick yet NOT letting it effect my family... You of all can understand. 
I found this site via the crohns site on healing well. I have met many individuals there who have been my support for years.
Seems the women here are just as wonderful! Prof
Posts.Title: new... feeling guilty still upset over dx

Posts.Content: I did call my onclologist today. Figure the radiation guy is just a 7 week doc.. the oncologist is now a life time one! Also.. went for another mammogram today AND..... they found more calcifications... never ending!!!

Posts.Content: I have found a small pee like nodule on the side of my breast. it feels hard but does not hurt... I actually feel it in certain positions but not all.  Should i be worried????
